text: Nabadwip Dham railway station is a Kolkata Suburban Railway Station on the Bandel-Katwa line. This is the main railway station of Nabadwip town of Nadia District in the state of West Bengal. It is under the Howrah railway division of Eastern Railway. It serves Nabadwip and the surrounding areas. == History == In 1913, the Hooghly–Katwa Railway constructed a line from Bandel to Katwa. This line was electrified in 1994-96 with 25 kV overhead line. A project 22 km in length, Nabadwip Dham-Patuli DL Railway Line is under construction. 170 Crore has been sanctioned by the Government of India. == References == Category:Railway stations in Nadia district Category:Howrah railway division Category:Kolkata Suburban Railway stations
title: Nabadwip Dham railway station
